Search the NLM NPI Registry

Source: R/end_nppes.R
nppes_nlm.Rd

Search the NLM NPI Registry

Usage

nppes_nlm(terms)

Source

API Documentation: https://clinicaltables.nlm.nih.gov/api/npi_idv/v3

Arguments

terms

<chr> Search terms, separated by spaces

Value

<tibble> of search results

Examples

nppes_nlm("john bethesda")
#>   
#> ℹ 134 Results ☰ 1 Request
#>   
#> # A tibble: 134 × 4
#>    name            npi        specialty                         address         
#>    <chr>           <chr>      <chr>                             <chr>           
#>  1 KELLY, JOHN     1760880173 Dentist                           4833 BETHESDA A…
#>  2 VAVREK, JOHN    1801864624 Military Health Care Provider     NNMC BETHESDA I…
#>  3 SCHACHT, JOHN   1760801047 Medical Genetics and Genomics     WR, 8901 ROCKVI…
#>  4 STANAVAGE, JOHN 1710634175 Physician/General Practice        8901 WISCONSIN …
#>  5 DANG, JOHN      1497245765 Physician/Internal Medicine       8901 WISCONSIN …
#>  6 SANCHEZ, JOHN   1437770369 Physician/Pathology               8901 WISCONSIN …
#>  7 WEEKS, JOHN     1750077236 Military Health Care Provider     8901 WISCONSIN …
#>  8 LINABURY, JOHN  1942564885 Physician/Dermatology             8901 WISCONSIN …
#>  9 COINER, JOHN    1649407032 Physician/Obstetrics & Gynecology 101 BETHESDA DR…
#> 10 ELLIS, JOHN     1104273275 Physician/Internal Medicine       8901 ROCKVILLE …
#> # ℹ 124 more rows
